casebody.data:
SANDISK CORPORATION, Appellant, v. INTERNATIONAL TRADE COMMISSION, Appellee, and Stmicroelectronics N.V. and Stmicroelectronics, Inc., Intervenors. No. 06-1187. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. March 6, 2007.

*985Before MAYER, GAJARSA, and PROST, Circuit Judges.

Judgment

PER CURIAM:

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 86.
